Name: Alexandra
Ingredients: 30 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
7.5 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: Creamy and chocolaty - reminiscent of a rum-laced, creamy mocha coffee.
Nutrition: One serving of Alexandra contains 262 calories
